title: Samsungâ€™s best (and most expensive) 8K TV is now available to purchase
content:
Samsung makes a lot of TVs, to the point where it can be hard to keep track of them all. The company announced most of its 2022 lineup during CES 2022 in January, and now the highest-end model with a QLED panel and 8K resolution is available to purchase. As you might expect, it’s not

The post Samsung’s best (and most expensive) 8K TV is now available to purchase appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has revealed its highest-end smart TV yet, the 8K QN900B, and you can get some store credit during the pre-order period.
